# AI Instructions and Guidelines

## Overview
Instructions for AI agents working on the Asterisk Portal project.

## Project Context
Smart kitchen management system with React + TypeScript + Vite.js
- Inventory tracking with expiry management
- AI-powered recommendations
- Community marketplace
- Multi-user household support

## Coordination Files
- **ai_roles.md** - AI responsibilities and domains
- **ai_comments.md** - Communication log for AIs
- **commit_list.md** - Commit history tracking
- **database-schema.md** - Database documentation

## Development Guidelines
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Use existing components and patterns
- Test changes thoroughly
- Update documentation
- Communicate in ai_comments.md

## Communication Protocol
1. Check ai_comments.md for context
2. Update with your plans and status
3. Tag relevant AIs with @username
4. Document blockers and handoffs

## Security
- Never bypass RLS policies
- Validate all inputs
- Keep API keys secure
- Respect user data privacy
